General.Name: PMPG Polskie Media S.A.
General.Description: PMPG Polskie Media SA, through its subsidiaries, operates in the traditional and new media markets. The company publishes WPROST, a weekly magazine; and Tygodnik Do Reczy and Historia Do Rzeczy magazines. It also publishes and distributes books, newspapers, magazines, and periodicals. In addition, the company provides advertising, website management, and printing services. Further, it engages in the production of films, video, and television programs; and publishing activities in the field of computer games. The company was formerly known as Platforma Mediowa Point Group Spólka Akcyjna and changed its name to PMPG Polskie Media SA in December 2014. PMPG Polskie Media SA was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Warsaw, Poland.
